parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine compartment fires can cause significant damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to total loss, and pose a risk to the safety of occupants and other road users.
symptoms: Smoke or flames coming from the engine compartment
smoke or flames coming from under the hood
smoke or flames noticed from the rear of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the front brake pin can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when reversing at low speeds.
symptoms: sudden and unexpected loss of braking performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when reversing at low speeds.
symptoms: sudden and unexpected loss of steering performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unstable Vehicle Handling and Pulling to One Side
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle's unstable handling and pulling to one side can cause loss of control, accidents, and increased stopping distances, which can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to either side while driving
wandering or drifting from side to side
requiring the driver to slow down or make corrections to maintain control
